title: [Mini Project] NolSpam - AI-Powered Spam Removal for Content Creator
notes: This is my mini project that I am currently working on. It is an AI Tool to eliminate spam comments, especially from illegal online gambling (Judol) with target market in Indonesia.

items.title: AI-Powered Anti-Spam Tool for Social Media Platforms
items.text: NolSpam leverages AI to detect and automatically remove spam comments from Youtube, addressing a critical pain point for content creators and businesses.

items.title: Focused Market Niche with Viral Potential (Judol)
items.text: Specializes in filtering spam from high-risk categories like illegal gambling (Judol), which are rampant in Southeast Asia, particularly Indonesia. Creating a strong regional product-market fit with high demand.

items.title: Saas with Monetization Potential (Service-Based or Subscription-Based)
items.text: With features like detailed analytics, auto reporting/blocking, and service offering, NolSpam has clear paths to monetization. Either as a subscription-based Saas tool or through managed services for influencers, agencies, and brands.

title: Goora - Menyala Kuotaku (My Data On Fire)
notes: A Data Saving & Multi User Video Platform Powered By Zoora AI (The Brain)

items.title: AI Accessibility & Inclusivity Engine (Zoora AI)
items.text: Zoora AI revolutionizes video accessibility, offering realtime sign language translation via animated avatars, multilingual auto subtitles/dubbing, and interaction via gestures, voice, or eye movement. A breakthrough for both global and disabled audiences.

items.title: Hyper Personalized Video Experience
items.text: From mood-based recommendations to adaptive video themes and voice-tone adjusted ads, Goora positions itself as the Netflix meets Tiktok with AI-Powered user empathy, opening massive personalization and monetization potential.

items.title: Data Saving & Smart Compression Focus for Emerging Markets
items.text: With smart video compression (H.265 + AI), Goora targets low bandwidth regions like Southeast Asia, addressing one of the biggest streaming pain points making it ideal for mass adoption in mobile first economies.

title: KetikinAI/Luno AI - Your AI Assistant for Thesis & Academic Papers
notes: Helping students finish their thesis faster & cleaner with AI

items.title: Market Ready Academic SaaS with Mass Adoption Potential
items.text: KetikinAI addresses a massive pain point in higher education thesis writing. The platform offers real value to 10M+ university students in Indonesia alone and is easily expandable to international markets.

items.title: Full Stack AI Ecosystem
items.text: Unlike typical AI tools, KetikinAI is not just a chatbot, it's a robust ecosystem with AI for formatting, writing, research, defense simulation, time management, mental wellness, and plagiarism detection, covering the entire thesis lifecycle.

items.title: Monetization Ready with Gamification & Community Hooks
items.text: With built-in referral system, premium tiers, gamificiation, and even CV Tools. KetikinAI is built for virality, retention, and monetization. Especially among budget conscious students.
